message.body: Danny we need you to come home right after work on Friday the 26th so that we can make sure we have all of the clothing that we need for the photo shoot on
Saturday. We may have to go shopping that evening and get you some things. We need to make sure that we need to do this right. Can you commit to
I have to look at my calendar at work. I might not be able to stay over. Might have something to do Saturday morning. But I can probably stop by Friday night
I can take you back fri nite
OK I'll check the calendar tomorrow at work
On the 26th I have something to do after work . I can be home around 730 I'll have to be back home around 1030 because Agata will most likely be visiting that weekend
Lets do it this weekend instead. In case we have to get you some things. The night before the shoot will be too stressful.
I said what because your text got split into two parts and I got the second part first.
OK it'll have to be Saturday afternoon/ evening. Does that work
Two bombs exploded at finish line of Boston Marathon
